name: Simple 1500 Series: Vol.31 - The Sound Novel
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Can you endure approaching terror?
In this horror suspense story, the player will become the protagonist and resolve the mysteries of the incidents that took place in the western house.
Among the 12 characters, various human relationships and unexpected story will be unveiled.
With a scenario and multi-ending you can repeat playing as many times as you want.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
